price: 56. (Ibraahiim) wuxuu yidhi: Mayee’ Rabbigiin waa Rabbiga samooyinka iyo arlada ee ah Kan abuuray, aniguna waxaan ka mid ahay kuwa arrinkani ka marag kaci.
arabic: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal rabbukum rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alladhī faṭarahunna wa-anā ʿalā dhālikum mina al-shāhidīna
